msbt.message: Thanks a TON for helping me find a spot for my tent. It's a PERFECT starting spot for all my morning, afternoon, and even my evening jogs. I got you a small something to say thanks. Try it on!
I'm serious about attracting some top-tier, first-round-draft-pick, intramural all-star neighboring talent. Here's the thing I said I was gonna send you. Now go flex that decorating muscle!
